Package shukan

Class ShukanModule

java.lang.Object
shukan.ShukanModule
public class ShukanModule extends Object
A module for Shukan planner.

      public int[] schedule()
      Gets the complete activity schedule.

    • left

      public int left(int week, int ln)
      Shifts an activity one step to the left.
      Parameters:
      week - The index of the start week where activities should be shifted.
      ln - The number of working weeks where activities should be shifted.
      Returns:
      the index of the start week where the first activity was shifted.

    • right

      public int right(int week, int ln)
      Shifts an activity one step to the right.
      Parameters:
      week - The index of the start week where activities should be shifted.
      ln - The number of working weeks where activities should be shifted.
      Returns:
      the index of the start week where the first activity was shifted.

      public boolean sloaded()

      Returns:
      true if student loads should be cumulated.

      Clears student load accumulator for the module.
